      • validateAndLoadObject

        public static <T> T validateAndLoadObject(org.json.simple.JSONObject object,
                                          java.lang.String parameterName,
                                          T expectedValue)
        Attempts to load the given parameterName, from the JSONFILE
        Parameters:
        object - The JSONObject to load the value from
        parameterName - The name of the parameter to load from the file
        expectedValue - What the value should equal
        Returns:
        The value retrieved from the JSONObject (this also should equal the expectedValue)
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException, - if it is null, not a string or does not match the expected value

      • loadObject

        public static <T> T loadObject(org.json.simple.JSONObject object,
                               java.lang.String parameterName,
                               java.lang.Class<T> type)
        Attempts to load the given parameterName, from the JSONFILE
        Parameters:
        object - The JSONObject to load the value from
        parameterName - The name of the parameter to load from the file
        Returns:
        The value retrieved from the JSONObject
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException, - if the value is null, or does not match the expected type
